title: Secret Seductions
description: Have the Best and Most Creative Sex of Your Life!Illustrated with gorgeous full-color erotic photography! Savor each tantalizing secret and feel the anticipation and excitement build as you rip open each seal, revealing the sexy scenarios and blow-by-blow details you and your partner can use to break out of your sexual habits and enjoy new levels of passion and pleasure.
author: Roxanne Colville
